conversation.content: Good afternoon. I'm calling about order... what's the word... requisition? Purchase order ED-7742.

Oh hi there! Let me pull that right up for you, just a sec... hmm, okay so I'm seeing ED-7742-XK9 here in our system, looks like it's for athletic equipment? Forty-seven uniforms and, uh, some training gear, is that right?
Correct. *exhales* This is the fourth call about this order.

Oh gosh, the fourth? I'm so sorry you've had to call that many times, that's... let me look at the notes here. Okay so I can see there were calls on the 12th, 15th, and, um, yesterday the 18th, and it looks like each rep gave you different information which is, I mean...
Yes. Each person has been... how do I put this... creative with their explanations.

*sharp inhale* Yeah I can imagine how frustrating that must be. So looking at tracking number TRK-892-KLMN-47, I think I see what might've happened here—the shipment got rerouted through facility DC-4 instead of DC-2, which probably explains why everyone's been seeing different...
*sigh* Look, I know this isn't your fault personally.

I really appreciate you saying that, honestly. Okay so here's what I'm gonna do, um, I'm escalating this to our expedited team right now with priority code EXP-URGENT-923, and they'll have it moving within, er, usually about two hours?
Two hours. After waiting... what's it been... twelve days already?
Right right, I know.
Our season starts Monday. That's three days from now.

Oh shoot, okay that changes things. Let me, hmm... actually you know what? I'm putting in an override—reference number OVR-4429-STAT—to get this on tomorrow's early delivery, arrival by 10:30 AM your time, and I'm waiving all expedited fees, obviously.
*exhales slowly* That would be... acceptable. If it actually happens.

It will, I promise. I'm personally flagging this with case ID CSE-ATHLETIC-7742-P1, which means it'll ping my dashboard if anything changes, and I can give you my direct extension if you'd like? It's 4782.
Yes. Please. Because the last three reps mysteriously couldn't provide that.
Ugh, I'm sorry, that's... anyway, yes, extension 4782, my name's Jordan, and honestly if there's any hiccup at all, even a tiny delay, I'll personally call you by, let's say noon tomorrow?
I appreciate that. This whole... what do you call it... procurement process has been absurd.

No you're absolutely right, it shouldn't be this hard. Oh actually, one more thing—I'm adding a credit of $247.50 to your account for the inconvenience, transaction ID TXN-892KLM, should process within...
That's very kind. *softer* Thank you for actually listening.

Of course! And hey, I mean, I played volleyball in college so I totally get how stressful pre-season is. Your confirmation number for everything we discussed today is CNF-7742-RESOLVE, and er, yeah, I'll make sure those uniforms get there.
